services.name: IDOL-Text-Index-Service
services.description: IDOL OnDemand Text Index Service - creates and binds to a text index

plans.name: standard-flavor
plans.description: A standard configuration that can accept up to 250,000 documents

plans.name: explorer-flavor
plans.description: An explorer configuration that can accept up to 25,000 documents.

plans.name: categorization-flavor
plans.description: An categorization index is used to categorise documents based on boolean restrictions and can be used to define up to 250,000 categories.

plans.name: querymanipulation-flavor
plans.description: An query manipulation index is used to store promotions and other query promotions to be applied as part of a query profile.

plans.name: custom_fields-flavor
plans.description: A custom_field configuration that can accept up to 250,000 documents
